reviewText: A continuation of book #1 of course but continues to challenge with more difficult chord styling and configurations. A great introduction to the blues given you have some finger picking ability.  Roy's are the first DVDs I've truly worked with all the way through.  A big "thumbs up"!

A world class musician with an a bundle of technique and talent laced with extraordinary wit and comedic timing. Easy and relaxed teaching style which makes learning a pleasure..I can`t wait for practice time so I can get to my guitar and start a session with Roy. The material is not terribly difficult but it would be good for you to have a pretty good handle on the thumb picking style of playing..... Buy this DVD, spend some time with it and you will learn a few things that will "change your life."
